 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.azeckoski.reflectutils.converters

Class Summary
ArrayConverter Handles conversions to arrays from various types (including other arrays), also handles the special case of a comma separated list of strings which it will attempt to convert into an array of strings or whatever was requested
BaseDateFormatHolder Simple class to add in support for controlling the formats to use when parsing the various dates
BigDecimalConverter BigDecimal passthrough
BigIntegerConverter BigInteger passthrough
BooleanConverter Converts objects into booleans (by default this will return Boolean.FALSE)
Special handling:
Numerics greater than 0 are true, less than or equal are false
Case is ignored when converting values to true or false.
ByteConverter Byte passthrough
CalendarConverter Passthrough to DateConverter for Calendar
CharacterConverter Converts objects to a character (will mostly truncate the string value of the object)
ClassConverter Converts a string to a class (this is pretty much the only conversion supported)
CollectionConverter Converter for collections (primarily for converting to other types of collections), can also from a scalar to a collection by placing the scalar value into the collection
DateConverter Handles conversions from objects into Date, generally the best way to handle this is to simply do conversions based on longs
Allows control over the conversion formats which are used by settings the patterns or the formats

Based on code from commons bean utils but updated for generics and removed complexity and (mis)usage of Exception
DoubleConverter Double passthrough
EnumConverter Handles conversions to enums (this is fairly limited to simply converting strings to enums)
FileConverter Simple converter to make File from strings
FloatConverter Float passthrough
IntegerConverter Integer passthrough
LongConverter Long passthrough
MapConverter Map converter to handle converting things into maps, Can handle simple cases by stuffing them into the map with the key "data"
NumberConverter Handles all the number conversions in a single converter, the other number converters are simply going to call through to this one
Special handling for Boolean, Date, Calendar, and String java.math.BigDecimal java.math.BigInteger java.lang.Byte java.lang.Double java.lang.Float java.lang.Integer java.lang.Long java.lang.Number java.lang.Short
Based on code from commons bean utils but updated for generics and removed complexity and (mis)usage of Throwable
ScalarConverter This is a special variable converter designed to handle the special case of converting from a non-scalar (collection, array, list, etc.) to a scalar object
ShortConverter Short passthrough
SQLDateConverter Passthrough to DateConverter for Date
SQLTimeConverter Passthrough to DateConverter for Time
StringConverter Converter to handle anything to string (this handles it in the way you would think)
TimestampConverter Passthrough to DateConverter for Timestamp
URLConverter Converts strings into URLs
